tools.name: list-therapists
tools.description: List all available therapists with their specializations and contact information

tools.name: book-appointment
tools.description: Book an appointment with a therapist. Requires valid JWT token for authentication.

jwtToken.description: Valid JWT token for patient authentication

therapistId.description: ID of the therapist to book with

appointmentDate.description: Date and time for the appointment (ISO 8601 format)

tools.name: list-appointments
tools.description: List all upcoming appointments for a patient. Requires valid JWT token for authentication.

jwtToken.description: Valid JWT token for patient authentication

tools.name: cancel-appointment
tools.description: Cancel an existing appointment. Requires valid JWT token and appointment ID. Only the patient who booked the appointment can cancel it.

jwtToken.description: Valid JWT token for patient authentication

appointmentId.description: ID of the appointment to cancel

tools.name: get-profile
tools.description: Get the patient's profile information. Requires valid JWT token for authentication.

jwtToken.description: Valid JWT token for patient authentication
